product_name: Sea to Summit Hydraulic Dry Bag with Harness - 35L
long_description: With enough space for extra layers or gear for day trips, the 35L Sea to Summit Hydraulic dry bag with harness protects gear while you paddle and then makes it easy to haul everything backpack-style.
short_description: With enough space for extra layers or gear for day trips, the 35L Sea to Summit Hydraulic dry bag with harness protects gear while you paddle and then makes it easy to haul everything backpack-style.
